title: Tears are gone
text:
Tears are gone but still I´m bleeding
Broken heart but so full of love
Long lost, that wont go away
not even for a day
Tears are gone but still I think of you
The good things that are different now
With someone else to hold on tight
that beautiful light
Tears are gone because of his help
with love and understanding in his heart
But you are still here and you will not go
Not even now, when I love him so
